title: Tag Terry 4 Pack 600 GSM Premium Bath Towels Large - Made of 100% Natural Cotton - 70x140cm Aqua Bath Towels - Highly Absorbent and Quick Dry Extra Large Towel - Bathroom Bath Set (Aqua)
features: SOFT, COMFY & ECO-FRIENDLY - Made with some of the softest cotton material out there, these cotton bath towels are certified by OEKO-TEX Standard 100 as they were manufactured in an eco-friendly factory.
AVAILABLE IN MULTIPLE COLOURS - Our pack of 4 large bath towel set comes in many attractive colors. You can select the perfect bathroom accessory for your bathroom with our unique set of towels.

CONVENIENT LOOPS - All Tag Terry luxury bath towels come with loops so you can hang them with ease. These bath towels are large (70x140cm), making them the perfect size to dry yourselves after a long bath.
MACHINE WASHABLE - Our machine washable extra large bath towels are quick and convenient to look after. All hems of our jumbo bath towels are double stitched for extra durability.
100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: At Tag Terry, the customer always comes first. If for any reason you are not satisfied, we will issue a full refund.
description: Product Description Tag Terry Brings You it’s Range of 100% Cotton Bath Towels Our 600 GSM bath towels are made to last with their durable and versatile qualities giving you a long-lasting experience. We maintain a high standard of quality for our towels meaning we provide you with 100% cotton towels that are soft to the touch with supreme absorbency. Super Absorbent Dry off comfortably in no time at all with our extra absorbent bath towels. These premium bath towels will ensure that you get dry as soon as you step out your shower or bath. So the next time that you’re dripping wet, use the towels by Tag Terry to dry yourself. Our towels are multipurpose and can be used as washcloths, kids washcloths, spa & hotel towels, gym towels, bath towels and much more! 100% Cotton The 100% cotton that Tag Terry bath towels use is made to provide you some of the best cotton bath towel experience out there. We, as a young brand ensure that we provide a high quality and most unique home décor providing you with a range of colours that you can mix and match with your bathroom aesthetic. On top of that our towels are super durable! Ultra soft The towels by Tag Terry feel ultra soft and incredibly delicate on one's skin while their composition allows them to be highly absorbent and durable. Our bath sheets were designed to provide the utmost comfort and durability as our towels are double stitched at the hem meaning they suffer less disintegration after washing, giving you a soft, absorbent and versatile coverage. Also, they get softer after every wash! Beyond Bath Towels! Tag Terry intends on providing high quality products to all of its customers. We intend on ensuring that all of our buyers maintain a long-lasting relationship with the brand. Our towels were made to keep you clean and dry you off quickly while also enhancing the overall aesthetics of your bathroom!
